title: Coleen Nolan begs men to stop sending her x-rated pics in bid to bag her
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Coleen Nolan has revealed that young men have been sending her penis pics online following her divorce.

Talking to Loose Women about people scamming others for their money, Coleen revealed that after the announcement she was splitting from husband Ray Fensome in February 2018, she was suddenly getting attention from people online.

Thing is, she saw right through it, and wasn’t impressed by those clearly attempting to get at her for fame and/or money.

She told the panel: ‘I am getting a lot of messages and pictures sent by very young men, showing me, what they’ve….”how much they’ve got”.’

When Gloria Hunniford asked her if she’d ever been tempted, she said: ‘Never! Like a) they’re all in their late 20s/30s. I want to go firstly, if I was Coleen Smith working in such and such a place, you wouldn’t be sending be these pictures, so you’re obviously [doing it for money/fame].

‘I just don’t believe them.’

Coleen Nolan reveals men are trying to seduce her online (Picture: ITV)

She then added: ‘I just want to go to them, “I’m 54. I’ve got children as young as you, I’ve seen all that before, it’s not interesting.”

‘I just want to go for a nice meal.’

Fair freaking play, Coleen.

More: Loose Women When does Stacey Solomon's Primark collection go on sale? Coleen Nolan returns to Loose Women with Boris Johnson sex joke Blue Peter’s Tim Vincent recalls tension with Bruce Willis over Demi Moore question

Coleen’s revelation comes as the group discussed how women and men were being scammed out of thousands of pounds by people who are trying to take advantage of the emotionally vulnerable for cash.

In large part, the examples given were newly single, and were reeled in by the attention of someone new and exciting.

Loose Women continues weekdays from 12.30pm on ITV.
